channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This is the first whiskey to be granted a new federal designation in over 50 years
item.description: American single malt, sometimes referred to as “American Scotch,” is now officially a style unto itself.

item.title: Dollar Likely to Stay Firm Until Year-End, Helped by Fed
item.description: The dollar is likely to remain firm until year-end as the Federal Reserve could scale back its guidance for interest-rate cuts next year, says ING. On...

item.title: Treasury Yields Rise Ahead of Expected Fed Cut
item.description: Treasury yields were higher ahead of the Fed decision, while weakening a bit on U.S. housing data.

item.title: Stocks are in the ‘greatest bubble in the history of civilization,’ this market pro warns. Blame the Fed.
item.description: Steve Burns keeps a list of stocks to buy — at much lower prices. Right now he’s short the U.S. market and buying gold and silver.

item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stocks Fall Less Than Expected
item.description: U.S. crude-oil inventories fell for a fourth consecutive week, but the decline was smaller than analysts had forecast.

item.title: Here’s how to make your investment adviser prove their stock-picking skill
item.description: Be skeptical of a firm’s investment research — especially when financial pros claim theirs is the best.

item.title: Cocoa Surges Past $12,000 on Supply Concerns
item.description: Prices have more than doubled since the start of the year, as severe droughts resulted in poor harvests in Ghana and Ivory Coast—the world’s biggest p...

item.title: Why money’s flowed into Bank of America bonds — and how a Fed pause in rate cuts may help financial firms
item.description: The Federal Reserve’s expected interest-rate cut Wednesday is seen as a potential boost for the banking sector, as corporate bond investors weigh pros...

item.title: U.S. Stocks Rise Ahead of Interest-Rate Decision
item.description: U.S. stocks rose as the Fed is overwhelmingly expected to cut interest rates this afternoon, but the case for continued reductions is less clear.

item.title: Here are the best gifts to help your loved ones build wealth, whether your budget is $100 — or $1 million
item.description: By giving financial gifts, especially to children, you’re “encouraging people to become more engaged in their personal well-being, financially,” a fin...
